markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Guiding Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=417) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 153 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=58) (Level 16)

**Prerequisites**
[Dueling Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=389)

</column>

---

By shifting your weight and angling your weapon, you guide your opponent to a more favorable position. When you use Dueling Riposte to Strike and you hit, you can move the target up to 10 feet into a space in your reach. This follows the [forced movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) rules.
name: Guiding Riposte

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 14" pfs="Standard" > Guiding Riposte Source Core Rulebook pg. 153 4.0 Archetype Duelist (Level 16) Prerequisites Dueling Riposte --- By shifting your weight and angling your weapon, you guide your opponent to a more favorable position. When you use Dueling Riposte to Strike and you hit, you can move the target up to 10 feet into a space in your reach. This follows the forced movement rules.
